pageProduct.name: Palmer's Coconut Oil Nourishing Shampoo 473ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer’s® Coconut Oil Formula®is a rich, creamy shampoo formulated with Coconut Oil, Tahitian Monoi and Keratin for strong, healthy hair.Ideal for colour-treated or heat-styled hair, this formula reduces frizz and leaves hair healthy, smooth and shiny.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Expertly formulated to nourish both hair and scalp, whilst repairing and strengthening dry, damaged strands. Raw Coconut Oil is naturally moisturising and nutrient rich, leaving hair healthy looking and with amazing shine. Keratin Protein repairs and restores dry, damaged hair strands, making them stronger and smoother. This formula deeply cleanses and removes product build up, whilst improving hair health.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Glycol Stearate, Cocamide DIPA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Leuconostoc/radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Polyquaternium-10, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phosphoric Acid, Coumarin.

Directions

Apply to wet hair. Work into creamy lather. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.
